system.description:
You have distilled both your connection to the elements and your ideological focus down to their basics, making it easier to use them in concept. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength or Charisma ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You can change your Elementalist spellcasting ability to Charisma if you desire. Once made, this choice is permanent.
  • Half your herald levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of gaining access to the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.z2q6kb24eks8nfy5]{Expand Element}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.1crnox672gxav694]{Improved Expand Element}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.6cdgfoktap5bxuwz]{Greater Expand Element} features.
  • Half your elementalist levels count as herald levels for the purpose of gaining access to the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.u220f22b3cpphtgb]{Empowered Smite} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.p9gkawegqqbxb821]{Greater Empowered Smite} features.
  • Choose one of the following:
    • Half your herald levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of determining your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uit7l3mc64l5h8h1]{Elemental Blast} damage.
    • Half your elementalist levels count as herald levels for the purpose of determining your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.c6aiq8cd90fo3ry1]{Divine Smite} levels.

      Regardless of which option you choose, you can never apply both Elemental Blast and Divine Smite damage to the same attack.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in Elementalist, 3 levels in Herald
